data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of La Unión, El Salvador.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of La Unión, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 118,317 believers living in La Unión, El Salvador.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in La Unión, El Salvador so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of La Unión, El Salvador.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Turk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Turk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Turk people is yours.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in La Unión with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in La Unión, El Salvador.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of La Unión, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

location.name: La Unión
location.cities_list: La Unión, Santa Rosa de Lima, San Alejo, Intipucá, Conchagua
location.cities_list_w_pop: La Unión (26,807), Santa Rosa de Lima (13,249), San Alejo (5,149), Intipucá (3,540), Conchagua (3,034)
